misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation.
description: The code is using the AES algorithm in GCM (Galois/Counter Mode) with no padding. However, GCM mode should use an authentication tag for secure encryption. Not using an authentication tag may lead to security vulnerabilities.
recommendation: Use AES/GCM/withPKCS5Padding or AES/GCM/withNoPadding to enable authentication tag for secure encryption.
